title: FS T206 Magee - EPDG PSA Auth Alt.
author: iwantitiwinit

posts.post_title: FS T206 Magee - EPDG PSA Auth Alt.
posts.post_content: I have a T206 Magee - EPDG PSA Authentic Altered up for sale on ebay.  I just reduced the price to 1299.99 on ebay.  I'll sell it here at $1125.00 pp ff.  Off back Magee's are difficult to find.
